tool_description: Get all the data from Bing Keyword Planner (Bing Keyword Research Tool). Get access to search volume, monthly searches, competition, and other related data.
name: Bing Keyword Planner
title: Bing Keyword Planner

api_list.name: URL Seed
api_list.description: Based on your provided keywords, this endpoint will return up to 3000 suitable keyword recommendations. Set up to 200 keywords and obtain the results that Bing Ads suggests for your query. Using this tool, you may obtain up to 3000 keyword ideas.

required_parameters.name: target_domain
required_parameters.description: The domain name of the target website.

optional_parameters.name: device
optional_parameters.description:
Limits data for a particular device type.

Possible values: *all*, *mobile*, *desktop*, *tablet*
Default value: *all*

api_list.name: Keyword Ideas
api_list.description: Based on your provided keywords, this endpoint will return up to 3000 suitable keyword recommendations. Set up to 200 keywords and obtain the results that Bing Ads suggests for your query. Using this tool, you may obtain up to 3000 keyword ideas.

required_parameters.name: keywords
required_parameters.description:
Comma-separated list of input keywords.

Maximum number of input keywords: 200

optional_parameters.name: device
optional_parameters.description:
Limits data for a particular device type.

Possible values: *all*, *mobile*, *desktop*, *tablet*
Default value: *all*

optional_parameters.name: location_name
optional_parameters.description:
Name of location.

Can be a Country, Region or City. 

Examples: \\\\\\\"United States\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"Germany\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"London,England,United Kingdom\\\\\\\"
